title: Carousel with circural/loop scrolling?
body: Is some possibility to have in the future circular/loop scrolling in Carousel control? I saw some old issue https://github.com/windows-toolkit/WindowsCommunityToolkit/issues/1462 but its inactive.

comments.body: Please comment on this proposal for a CarouselView control: https://github.com/microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml/issues/771
